fields.title: Twilight
fields.author: Stephenie Meyer
fields.description: The story of the love between vampire Edward Cullen and ordinary girl Bella Swan, who moves to the small town of Forks and finds herself drawn into a world of the supernatural.

fields.title: Percy Jackson and the Lightning Thief
fields.author: Rick Riordan
fields.description: The adventures of modern teenager Percy Jackson, who discovers he is the son of Poseidon and embarks on a dangerous journey to return Zeus's stolen lightning bolt.

fields.title: The House of Hades
fields.author: Rick Riordan
fields.description: The continuation of Percy Jackson's adventures and his friends, where they face new threats and travel to the House of Hades to save the world from ancient evil.

fields.title: Crime and Punishment
fields.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
fields.description: The story of student Rodion Raskolnikov, who commits the murder of a pawnbroker and her sister, and his internal struggle with guilt and moral dilemmas.

fields.title: A Game of Thrones
fields.author: George R. R. Martin
fields.description: The first book in the 'A Song of Ice and Fire' series, describing the struggle for power in the fictional world of Westeros, where several noble families vie for the Iron Throne.
fields.category: A Song of Ice and Fire

fields.title: Fire & Blood: The Targaryen Dynasty
fields.author: Erin Bowman
fields.description: A prequel to the 'A Song of Ice and Fire' series, telling the story of the Targaryens and their struggle for power, filled with intrigue, betrayal, and dragons.
fields.category: A Song of Ice and Fire

fields.title: Fire & Blood: The Dance of the Dragons
fields.author: Erin Bowman
fields.description: The continuation of the Targaryen story, where new secrets are revealed and the struggle for power continues in a world full of danger and intrigue.
fields.category: A Song of Ice and Fire

fields.title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
fields.author: George R. R. Martin
fields.description: A collection of stories about the adventures of knight Dunk and his squire Egg, who travel through the Seven Kingdoms and face various challenges.
fields.category: A Song of Ice and Fire

fields.title: A Feast for Crows
fields.author: George R. R. Martin
fields.description: The fourth book in the 'A Song of Ice and Fire' series, continuing the epic saga of the struggle for power in Westeros, where new conflicts and intrigues unfold.
fields.category: A Song of Ice and Fire

fields.title: The Lovely Bones
fields.author: Alice Sebold
fields.description: The story of a girl named Susie Salmon, who is murdered and watches over her family from heaven, trying to help them cope with her loss and find her killer.

fields.title: The Song of Achilles
fields.author: Madeline Miller
fields.description: A novel about Achilles, reimagining the myths of the Trojan War and revealing deep human emotions and relationships.

fields.title: Fathers and Sons
fields.author: Ivan Turgenev
fields.description: The story of generational conflict and nihilism, where the main character, young doctor and nihilist Eugene Bazarov, confronts traditional values and societal norms.

fields.title: New Moon
fields.author: Stephenie Meyer
fields.description: The second book in the Twilight series, where Bella Swan faces new challenges and heartbreak as she navigates her relationship with Edward Cullen.

fields.title: Eclipse
fields.author: Stephenie Meyer
fields.description: The third book in the Twilight series, where Bella Swan must choose between her love for Edward Cullen and her friendship with Jacob Black.

fields.title: Breaking Dawn
fields.author: Stephenie Meyer
fields.description: The fourth book in the Twilight series, where Bella Swan and Edward Cullen face new challenges as they start a family together.

fields.title: Midnight Sun
fields.author: Stephenie Meyer
fields.description: The fifth book in the Twilight series, retelling the events of the first book from Edward Cullen's perspective.

fields.title: Percy Jackson and the Sea of Monsters
fields.author: Rick Riordan
fields.description: The second book in the Percy Jackson & the Olympians series, where Percy and his friends embark on a new adventure to save Camp Half-Blood.

fields.title: Percy Jackson and the Titan's Curse
fields.author: Rick Riordan
fields.description: The third book in the Percy Jackson & the Olympians series, where Percy and his friends face new threats and challenges.

fields.title: Percy Jackson and the Battle of the Labyrinth
fields.author: Rick Riordan
fields.description: The fourth book in the Percy Jackson & the Olympians series, where Percy and his friends navigate the Labyrinth to save Camp Half-Blood.

fields.title: Percy Jackson and the Last Olympian
fields.author: Rick Riordan
fields.description: The fifth book in the Percy Jackson & the Olympians series, where Percy and his friends face the final battle against the Titans.

fields.title: The Lost Hero
fields.author: Rick Riordan
fields.description: The first book in the Heroes of Olympus series, introducing new characters and adventures in the world of Greek and Roman mythology.

fields.title: The Son of Neptune
fields.author: Rick Riordan
fields.description: The second book in the Heroes of Olympus series, where Percy Jackson returns and faces new challenges in the Roman world.

fields.title: The Mark of Athena
fields.author: Rick Riordan
fields.description: The third book in the Heroes of Olympus series, where the heroes face new threats and adventures.

fields.title: The Blood of Olympus
fields.author: Rick Riordan
fields.description: The fifth book in the Heroes of Olympus series, where the heroes face the final battle against the giants.
